grounding: 5-4-3-2-1 grounding technique: Name 5 things you can see, 4 you can touch, 3 you can hear, 2 you can smell, 1 you can taste.
Deep breathing: inhale for 4 seconds, hold for 4, exhale for 4, hold for 4.
tips: Remember to take breaks and move your body.
Writing your thoughts down can help process emotions.
